Package org.jboss.seam.util

Utils - you knew they were here somewhere.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Conversions.Converter<Z>  
    Conversions.PropertyValue  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotatedBeanProperty<T extends Annotation>
    A convenience class for working with an annotated property (either a field or method) of a JavaBean class.
    Base64
    Encodes and decodes to and from Base64 notation.
    Base64.InputStream
    A Base64.InputStream will read data from another java.io.InputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
    Base64.OutputStream
    A Base64.OutputStream will write data to another java.io.OutputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.

    DelegatingInvocationHandler<T>
    An InvocationHandler implementation that delegates method invocations to a specified object, optionally allowing the method to be overridden locally.
    DTDEntityResolver
    An EntityResolver implementation which attempts to resolve various systemId URLs to local classpath lookups Any systemId URL beginning with http://jboss.org/schema/seam/ is searched for as a classpath resource in the classloader which loaded the Seam classes.
